summary: In 1218 Danish king Valdemar sends his homonymous young son and heir in safety, as war is at the borders, to Erskil, the bishop of Ravensburg, who is instructed to see to the prince's ... See full summary »
cast: Nijas Ørnbak-Fjeldmose|Lasse Baunkilde|Lars Lohmann|Björn Granath|Bjørn Floberg|Rasmus Haxen|Kristian Halken|Maj Bockhahn Bjerregaard|Baard Owe|Hardy Rafn|Torbjørn Hummel|Asger Reher|Folmer Rubæk|Steen Stig Lommer|Lasse Lunderskov|Lars Knutzon|Gyrd Løfquist|Hugo Øster Bendtsen|Frank Lundsgaard Gundersen|Peter Rygaard|Lise Schrøder|Benny Hansen|Jens Basse Dam|Claus Gerving|Kim Jansson|Jaques Lauritsen|Frans Kannik|Niels-Henrik Sørensen|Ole Ernst|Erik Wedersøe
title: Los ojos del águila
